body: { "text":"Issue Number : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{issueNumber}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"Issue Date : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{issueDate}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Issuing Store Name : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{issuingStoreName}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"Issuing Store Dept. : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{issuingStoreDept}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Supplier Name : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{supplierName}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Indent Purpose : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{indentPurpose}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"Issue Status", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{issueStatus}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Created By : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{createdBy}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"Designation : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{designation}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Issue Total Amount : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] , "style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{issueTotalAmount}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"colSpan":3, "style": "tm-cols-table"}
{ "text":"Remark : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] , "style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{remark}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"colSpan":3, "style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Sr.No.", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Material Code", "border":[ true, true, true, true ], "style": "tm-sub-table" }, { "text":"Material Name", "border":[ true, true, true, true ], "style": "tm-sub-table" }, { "text":"Material Description", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"UOM Name", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Quantity Issued", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Unit Rate", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Total Value", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Remark", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}

{{#variable1}}[ "{ "text":"{{srNo}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{materialCode}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ], "style": "tm-sub-table-value" }, { "text":"{{materialName}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ], "style": "tm-sub-table-value" }, { "text":"{{materialDescription}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{uomName}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{quantityIssued}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{unitRate}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{totalValue}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{remark}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}" ]{{/variable1}}

{ "text":"Review/Approval Date", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Reviewer-Approver Name", "border":[ true, true, true, true ], "style": "tm-sub-table" }, { "text":"Reviewer Designation", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Action", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Send To", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Approval Status", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}

{{#variable2}}[ "{ "text":"{{ReviewApprovalDate}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{ReviewerApproverName}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ], "style": "tm-sub-table-value" }, { "text":"{{Designation}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{Action}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{SendTo}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{ApprovalStatus}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}" ]{{/variable2}}
